name: simpleXrm
tagline: Save time writing client side code for Dynamics CRM. Write interactive forms for Dynamics CRM using the javascript API. Less time on syntax, more time on business logic.
body:
### Welcome to simpleXrm.js
simpleXrm.js is a JavaScript library that provides a layer of abstraction between client side code (such as Dynamics CRM form scripts and SPAs) and the Microsoft Dynamics CRM JavaScript API. For more information [browse the source](https://https://github.com/joenewstrom/simpleXrm/).

### Author and Principal Developer
Joe Newstrom (@joenewstrom) develops and maintains simpleXrm.js and is always interested in contributions.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with simpleXrm.js? Appalled by my lack of documentation? Find a bug?  Send me a message at [joe.newstrom@arrow-lift.com](mailto:joe.newstrom@arrow-lift.com) and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
